entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 5:30 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 11 except temperature steady near minus 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11 except temperature steady near minus 7 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023
